title.label: Screen tearing in Regroup and Burnt Bridges

content.label:
This game is a classic for fans of this universe, but the app version for the newest ipad pro has an issue with the graphics. I notice screen tears with several maps and the weapons glare/glow is also disruptive to the stability of the graphics/card display.  This could be fixed to make it safer for the hardware. 

This game is so great, that I have it running on 3 different iOS versions. Another way to consolidate games or mirror extra saves or something would be sweet. (Many unlocked characters are so good to level, but access to saves or something like layers of profiles or something). 

Item menu as drop-down list or a filter might help (when you get mad amounts of rare loot).  If there is a follow-up to this one, JUST AS IS, that would be tight. This one is so much better for turn-based strategy. (More like this one!)
Like the title says the game crashes every time on startup. Don’t waste your money
I should have read some of the real reviews. Bought it and tried playing. Crashed twice before even loading. Deleted and reinstalled and same issue.

App crashing at launch, I have iPhone X.
Please fix this so a lot of us can play and rerate.

Wasted $2. When launching the app the loading screen comes up for 10 seconds then crashes. Tried uninstalling and redowloading, but app still crashes. Shame because I was looking forward to playing.. don’t waste your money!
Wish I could give a more in depth review, but this game gets stuck on the launch screen.  Brand new iPhone XR.

title.label: Game does not work anymore and you just had an update. Been broke for awhile.

content.label: Game does not work anymore and you just had an update. Been broke for awhile
Developers went under and now app was never updated and won’t work on newer devices. Won’t even load up the game anymore.

title.label: Trash - can’t believe this hasn’t been removed!

content.label: This game absolutely does not load on the iPhone. It used to, but now it crashes every single time. I can’t believe they still have it for sale on the App Store. This shouldn’t be allowed! Rodeo even advertises it as available on iOS when you go to their website. So frustrating.

This is a marvelous game but won’t launch on my iOS updated iPhone 11 Pro Max. Plenty of free space, excellent internet connection, but crashes on the initial splash screen. Fine on my iPad Pro, but I want to play it on my iPhone.
Crashes on launch every single time. $2 well spent.

This would have been so nice. It’s too bad Rodeo went under and no longer supports the title. On an up-to-date iPhone X, this will hang at the splash screen and then crash. It’s ok—I enjoy setting fire to $1.99 every now and then... Apple really needs to remove this title from their store.
I decide as this was one of the best games I wanted to revisit it. Well now it crashes completely out at loading. Is there some issue that won’t be fixed?
App freezes when it opens.
Can’t get past the loading screen. Can I get my $ back please?

This is a great 40K turn based strategy game, and an incredible follow up to Rodeo Games Hunter series, but Rodeo Games, the publisher, closed up shop. There are several known bugs that never got patched, but none will keep you from enjoying the game  (just maybe not finish on the highest difficulty level.

Even several years out, its still fun to download the game again and play it through. Just remember to never uninstall the game like I did. I lost so many rare heroic characters and gear.

The Emperor protects, but not deleting the game doesn’t hurt.
Game no longer loads on my iPhone XR, probably not worth buying anymore
Just got it keeps crashing won’t load at all.
Would be a great port if the game didn’t get stuck every time you get hit by a 2x2 mob. Then the only way to get unstuck is to abandon the mission and lose all your xp.
The game will not run it keeps crashing give me my money back

This is a beautiful, highly playable game, with a quickly learnable, intuitive UI and no requirement for IAPs, although the ones there are are reasonably priced and a good value for gameplay. Congratulations to the designers—you did a great job on this!

title.label: Needs to be fixed or removed from the App Store

content.label: I had read reviews and the game seemed cool but as of 2020 the game won’t even start it loads for about 10 seconds and crashes I bought the game and basically wasted my money because the game isn’t even playable would love to get a refund on a game that won’t even launch but I doubt that will ever happen

title.label: Adding my complaint to the others

content.label: Just adding in as the principle of it is important... people deserve refunds. Don’t sell a game that no longer works.

title.label: Love Warhammer stuff but this game won’t even start

content.label: So I’ve got an iPhone XR and bought this game and it won’t even start for me. It opens, then freezes, then crashes every time. I would love to actually play this and give it a better review, but as I cannot play it, it’s stuck at a 1 star. Will edit the review if I ever get it working

As the title says if you’re reading this the company that made this game was absorbed into another company and they no longer do any updates or work on this project. This game will no longer work and is a Relic in the App Store. Do not download as it will not work it’s no longer being worked on and there will be no update. Thank you all for playing and being apart of its longevity.
Hey guy not sure wats wrong with this app but I cant play it I’m a lover of games workshop so can u guy please do something about this app then I’ll definitely give it a five stars
As of 2019 this app does not work.
Game crashes on launch. Never even got to play it. After paying for it once in a bundle then again by itself.
Can’t be played in 2020. Do not purchase until update.
Game loads for 15-30 seconds then quits. Won’t get past loading screen. Real bummer because I never finished it.
I paid for the game and I can’t even play it because it crashes ever 15 seconds I deleted it and reinstalled it and restart my phone to and no luck
Either fix the game or give me a refund. WHY DOES GAMES WORKSHOP TAKE SUCH PRIDE IN THEIR TABLETOP BUT COULD GIVE A FLYING **** ABOUT THERE GAMES
This game will crash upon opening. Doesnt matter if you delete it and reinstall. Flat out does not work. I want my money back!!
Not a real game. Shows title screen, then crash to home screen.  iPhone 11 Pro Max

But forget playing it on anything new. Played great on my 6s even with the latest OS but now just crashes on the 2020 se. Since Rodeo Games closed due to poor sales from this game it’s doubtfully anyone will ever play it again.
Literally just freezes and forces the app to close kinda disappointing.
I have iPad Air 3rd gen and app crashes immediately. Doesn’t even get past initial splash screen.
Seems like a lot of people are dealing with the same issue: pretty big since this is a paid game.. what’s going on?

title.label: Game will not open from loading screen

content.label: Please fix this game we all bought who love WH40K universe. I have iPhone 11 Pro Max and simply will not open at loading screen. I play games at 60 FPS should have np playing this game on my phone

title.label: Does not work on newer phones

content.label: Bought very excitedly, but can’t get past the initial screen. Apparently a wide spread problem, but unplayable as is and a waste of money
Great game! But sadly will not open for me anymore with a current IPhone

title.label: I can’t play it on my iPhone 8 Plus plz help

content.label: Plz help I really wanted to play this game I bought it and now I cannot even play it it just doesn’t open it just kicks me out  plz help
Game just doesn’t work. Freezes on loading screen and crashes. (On iPhone 11)

To be fair, I really do like this game.  My problem with it are all of the bugs.  Overwatch randomly doesn’t work causing marines to take damage or die, fog of war is glitchy, marines randomly shoot multiple times and waste AP’s, and the responsiveness of touches to select marines is terrible(I have moved the wrong marine countless times).  All of that is annoying and frustrating but it doesn’t make the game unplayable.  What makes it borderline unplayable for me is randomly losing missions for no reason at all. This game is built around earning experience points to be used to level up, and when you lose a mission all of your marines lose all of their experience.  So when you randomly lose a mission and all of your exp goes to 0, it makes the game pointless to play.  I had saved up 20K+ exp on all 5 marines and lost it all for no reason - not happy!  Also, this game does not work on the phone - crashes at loading page.
Game does not load have latest iPhone and nothing won’t get past load screen

Payed for the app expecting a fun warhammer experience but all i got in return is constant crashes. The game doesn’t even get past the loading screen. Developers fix your game or give me my money back. If you have a newer iphone stay away from this app.

update: still broken over a year later. no word from devs.
The app does not even load up. Do not waste your money on this game. The developer did not answer any of my emails. It’s a shame.
When I don’t have time to set up to play WH 40k this is what I play. :)

title.label: Great game that I’d like to see more of

content.label: I see a ton of people have trouble running this app but It works well for me. I’m running it on an older IPad if that helps. This game has excellent mechanics and limited in app purchases so if you just play you can get everything so that’s a definite plus. Good storyline and an excellent addition to the 40k games available for IPad.

I used to love this game. Just got a new I phone SE and downloaded it to get back into playing it and it shuts down before even starting. Can’t even play it. Support offered no help. Don’t download as it isn’t playable anymore and a waste of time and money
